segments.text: Hey , check out this new game I bought today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! It's a trivia game all about the Academy Awards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know you love the Oscars . This game has some great questions about all types of movies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it have questions about foreign language films ? There's hardly any American films worth watching .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . In fact , one of the categories is on foreign language films .
segments.speaker: S1
